flavor_text: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokemon by the ancient people who made them.
Golurk were created to protect people and Pokemon. They run on a mysterious energy.
